text: Review is not about the quality of education. The place is mostly under renovation as of Nov 2018. But has decent size classrooms, a small canteen and a good multi purpose hall. Very close to beauty world MRT is a plus.

My son is studying last 3 years in dimension. I really impressed by the school and teacher. More responsive and caring about student safety . Even though some teacher changes they select new teacher well qualified. As of no issue with school .

location good convenience, high quality school, student know how to obey themselves due to teachers know how to teach them. And every holidays eve teachers will create celebration, they enjoy it. Their disciples is good to learn.

Dimensions Primary School BukitTimah-
I can say this is best school academics wise, budget friendly and provides a holistic development of child.
The staff are polite, warm and pretty informative at both the campuses.
Creative learning rather than stressing or by hearting.
Teachers are mostly  Singaporeans , that's the best  thing coz they are so warm, kind, patient  and empathetic towards students.
as part of CCA the child learns Music, drawing, painting, word puzzles , Sudoku etc.
Transportation facility available all around Singapore. the bus captains are friendly.
my child is in P3 here I'm extremely happy about my decision on choosing Dimensions.
i would recommend this school with an immense confidence.
Nice school. My kids like the school. Teachers are caring and helpful academically and personally.
